title: Hey junglers, I appreciate you ganking  my lane
body:
And most often, I don't care who gets the kill which generally lends more kills to my junglers than myself. But when we push the wave afterwards, can you not take every single minion including the canon, especially when I give you the kill? I want gold too and this feels especially worse when I'm in a bad match up and could use every piece of gold I can get. 

Alright jungler can't do wrong circlejerk, come at me.

replies.body:
Hey laners, I appreciate that you followed up on my gank

And most often I don't care who gets the kill. But when I go to push the wave afterwards and deliberately don't take a single creep, please don't yell at me in all caps to stop taking your CS. Their teleport is down, I want to deny them XP and if possible pressure tower.

Alright jungler is the antichrist circlejerk, come at me.

> [{quoted}](name=Troy242621,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RERmlA54,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-27T15:37:53.168+0000)

> 
> Alright jungler is the antichrist circlejerk, come at me.
>antichrist circlejerk

This is why you don`t look for weird movies when you write on the boards. It will get mixed up.

hey junglers

stay out of my lane
Who ever blames their jungler is a god damn ignorant fool that probably hasnt mained jungle beffore

> [{quoted}](name=JeffLeague123,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RERmlA54,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-05-28T03:42:02.536+0000)
>
> Who ever blames their jungler is a god damn ignorant fool that probably hasnt mained jungle beffore

I play Support sometimes, and I've watched some pretty shocking things from my team's jungler. I've sat and watched our jungler go from topside to botside for a gank without taking a single camp.
So from what i see that's a helpful jungler or a a jungler that always has a team with an available gank every minute.

> [{quoted}](name=JeffLeague123,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RERmlA54,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2017-05-28T19:46:12.260+0000)
>
> So from what i see that's a helpful jungler or a a jungler that always has a team with an available gank every minute.

No, it's a jungler that doesn't understand that farm > ganks, and that being underleveled and underfarmed means the enemy jungler's ganks will gradually become stronger, and if he's counterganked it's considerably more likely to swing the other way.

People have unrealistic expectations from their junglers sometimes, but I just ask that they have a certain level of competency with the role. This is like laning and valuing trades over CS.
Yi mains in a nutshell LOL
Haha nice try reasonable laner. I'm still not leaving my jungle until 15 minutes.
if they take your farm, just roam a bit and take some of theirs. if u desperately need it they will understand
